name: Imagine
description: Imagine is an innovative image transformation and editing platform powered by cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology. From basic adjustments like cropping and resizing to advanced AI-driven features such as style transfer, object removal, and image synthesis

name: Luxe Lens
description: Luxe Lens is a E-Commerce App, a robust and modern web application built to revolutionize the online shopping experience

name: Readme Editor
description: Readme Editor empowers developers to efficiently craft informative and visually appealing READMEs that effectively communicate the purpose, usage, and installation instructions of their projects.

name: Ketan Raj's Portfolio
description: Tailored to reflect your unique skills and experiences, this platform serves as a digital portfolio where you can highlight your projects, share your achievements, and showcase your skills to potential employers, clients, or collaborators. With a sleek and intuitive design.
